shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Light Snow Likely
name: Today
detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 8am, then a chance of rain between 10am and 2pm, then rain likely and patchy fog between 2pm and 4pm, then snow likely and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a high near 39. Northwest wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.
